org.apache.giraph.utils

接口 ExtendedDataOutput

  • 所有超级接口:
    DataOutput
    所有已知实现类:
    ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput, UnsafeByteArrayOutputStream

    public interface ExtendedDataOutput
extends DataOutput
    Add a few features to data output

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      byte[] getByteArray()
      Get the internal byte array (if possible), read-only
      int getPos()
      Get the position in the output stream
      void reset()
      Clears the buffer
      void skipBytes(int bytesToSkip)
      Skip some number of bytes.
      byte[] toByteArray()
      Copies the internal byte array
      void writeInt(int pos, int value)
      In order to write a size as a first part of an data output, it is useful to be able to write an int at an arbitrary location in the stream

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.io.DataOutput

        write, write, write, writeBoolean, writeByte, writeBytes, writeChar, writeChars, writeDouble, writeFloat, writeInt, writeLong, writeShort, writeUTF

    • 方法详细资料

      • skipBytes

        void skipBytes(int bytesToSkip)
        Skip some number of bytes.
        参数:
        bytesToSkip - Number of bytes to skip

      • writeInt

        void writeInt(int pos,
            int value)
        In order to write a size as a first part of an data output, it is useful to be able to write an int at an arbitrary location in the stream
        参数:
        pos - Byte position in the output stream
        value - Value to write

      • getPos

        int getPos()
        Get the position in the output stream
        返回:
        Position in the output stream

      • getByteArray

        byte[] getByteArray()
        Get the internal byte array (if possible), read-only
        返回:
        Internal byte array (do not modify)

      • toByteArray

        byte[] toByteArray()
        Copies the internal byte array
        返回:
        Copied byte array

      • reset

        void reset()
        Clears the buffer
